titleStmt.title: The saints beliefe by me John Turner, prisoner of our Lord Jesus Christ.
titleStmt.author: Turner, John, prisoner of our Lord Jesus Christ.

publicationStmt.publisher: by a true coppy, by the authors appointment for William Larnar, and are to be sold at the Anchor in Pauls Chaine,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
